name: shadcnblocks-astro-themes-bundle
title: Shadcnblocks Astro Themes Bundle
desc: 7 Templates & 800 block components built with Astro, shadcn/ui & Tailwind.
article:
The ultimate template & block set for Shadcn UI & Tailwind

Explore a premium collection of 800+ uniquely crafted blocks and components, custom-built for shadcn/ui, Tailwind, and React. Designed and developed by our expert team


Enjoy 7 Premium shadcn/ui templates built with Astro 5, Tailwind 4, React 19, Typescript and MDX. Our modern, responsive and ready to use website templates include the original Figma files and are available to purchase individually or get them all on the premium plan.


Tech Stack


  • Astro 5
  • shadcn/ui
  • Tailwind 4
  • Figma
  • MDX
  • Typescript


All Templates Feature


  • 100+ components
  • 10+ pages
  • Figma File included
  • Astro React
  • All pages built using block sections, easily insert new blocks from our library!
  • Astro content collections
  • Markdown & MDX
  • Responsive mobile-first design
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
